resources.string: If you deny permission, you can not use this service. Please turn on permissions in [Setup]-> [Permission]
Now, you are all set with your phone connected to the right 2.4 GHz WiFi and a WiFi symbol is blinking on the scale screen.\n\nEnter the WiFi password and tap on Configure.

1) Please enter your WiFi network name and password. 

2) Tap “Confirm” to confirm that the network name and password is accurate. 

3) Follow the instructions on the screen.
To Know Your Weight follow the steps below :
1. With scale placed on sturdy, leveled and hard surface, step on the scale bare footed.
2. The digits displaying weight will blink three times, and a dotted line will show up three times, after that step down the scale.
3. Continue doing so several times a week.
1. Step on the scale and measure your weight
2. Scale start blinking and with your weight & stop
Please Select Weight Managment Goal Type
I am having all the info.
I agree to all the Terms and Conditions
Battery Low! Please change the battery in scale immediately.
Battery Low! Please change the battery in scale very soon.
Show My Performance To The Primary User

Let\'s try another method to setup WiFi on scale, the current method is not suitable for your network. Please remove the batteries from the scale and put them back. Press and hold the Black button in the batteries compartment until you see \'AP\' next to the WiFi symbol. Release the button. Tap on AP Config below.
Allow accountability circle members to view my:
No scale ID found associated with your account, please have the primary user registered before you login.
You have signed up successfully. For you to start using the service, please have the primary user to complete his/her registration process.
Press update button to update the profile image
Frequent messaging with your accountability circle members is a good idea
Please enter your desired weight and time
Please choose one of the options, “Accept SureFiz Weight” or “I Will Provide Weight and Time”
Time To Lose Weight Will Be Calculated After The First Weight

Sign up is complete. Your free scale will arrive within 2 to 5 business days of your purchase from Amazon. When you receive your scale, login into the SureFiz mobile App, with email ID and password created during this signup. Your email will be validated during app login automatically. Alternatively, you can validate your email by clicking on the verification link we have sent to you to your email address.

Sign up is complete. Log into the SureFiz mobile App, with email ID and password created during this signup. Your email will be validated during app login automatically. Alternatively, you can validate your email by clicking on the verification link we have sent to you to your email address.
As a security measure, newer versions of Android have added an additional step to connect to WiFi. Therefore next, you will see a popup with temporary WiFi of your scale named,
please select this network to connect.
I have bought subscription through Amazon Already
"Please note, should you choose this option, you will need to provide your desired weight and the time to lose that weight. Would you like to proceed with “I Will Provide Weight & Time”?"
I have already bought subscription through SureFiz Website
I have not bought subscription from anywhere yet, I need to buy now
I have bought subscription through a source which was neither SureFiz nor Amazon
Changing these parameters will reassign your sub goals. Current data on your charts will reset. Are you sure you want to proceed?
This notification is expired and cannot be used now because the scale is turned off and is no more broadcasting your weight.

1. From your phone Settings, verify that your phone is connected to a 2.4 GHz WiFi network. If not, please go to phone Settings and connect to the WiFi on which you plan to use your scale before you proceed further.

2. Install batteries into the scale. The WiFi symbol on the scale screen should be blinking.

3. If batteries are already installed, remove them and reinstall. If WiFi symbol is not blinking. Press and hold the Black button in batteries compartment until you see flashing WiFi Symbol. Please make sure the WiFi symbol is blinking on the scale screen before you can procced further.

Is your phone connected to the correct WiFi and a WiFi symbol is flashing on the scale screen?
